name: Crusadia Testament
desc:
Activate 1 of these effects.
● For the rest of this turn, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects in response to the activation of your “Crusadia” monsters' effects.
● After damage calculation, if your “Crusadia” Link Monster destroyed an opponent's monster by battle: Draw cards equal to that monster's Link Rating.
You can only activate 1 "Crusadia Testament" per turn
str1: Prevent response to your "Crusadia" monsters' effects
str2: Draw after a "Crusadia" Link monster destroys a monster
str3: Affected by "Crusadia Testament", opponent cannot chain to the effects of "Crusadia" monsters
